SELECT MEMBER.RNUM, MEMBER.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER.AUTH, MEMBER.NICKNAME, MEMBER.EMAIL , MEMBER.MEMBERCLASS, MEMBER.CASH, MEMBER.AGE, MEMBER.GENDER , to_char(MEMBER.CRE_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM')as CRE_DATE , to_char(MEMBER.MOD_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM')as MOD_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.MEMBER_NO, M.AUTH, M.NICKNAME, M.EMAIL, M.MEMBERCLASS ,M.CASH, M.AGE, M.GENDER ,M.CRE_DATE ,M.MOD_DATE FROM( SELECT MEMBER_NO, AUTH, NICKNAME, EMAIL, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE ,MEMBERCLASS, CASH, AGE, GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY AUTH, CRE_DATE) M ) MEMBER WHERE MEMBER.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
